id.description: The code id, which must be unique across all schemes
id.name: id

uri.description: URI for the code within the scheme defining this type
uri.name: uri

code.description: Code within the scheme defining this type
code.name: code

unit.description: define the units, if one units matches
unit.name: unit

unit.description: The units typically used to express the need
unit.name: unit

version.description: semantic version id of the form X.Y.Z
version.name: version

fwk_number.description: Framework (RM) number of related framework if required. @Example RM123
fwk_number.name: fwk_number

offerType.description: Name of the subclass of the Offering, supporting the Agreement
offerType.name: offerType

part_of_id.description: Agreement this is part of, applicable only to Lots
part_of_id.name: part_of_id

conforms_to_id.description: Agreement this conforms to, such as a Contract conforming to a Framework
conforms_to_id.name: conforms_to_id

item_type.description: describe the items that can be offered under the agreement
item_type.name: item_type

min_value.description: Minimum value of award, in pounds sterling
min_value.name: min_value

max_value.description: Maximum value of award, in pounds sterling
max_value.name: max_value

value.description: an object of the type matching type->units
value.name: value

agreement_id.description: The agreement this offering relates to
agreement_id.name: agreement_id

id.description: unique id for the offering across all offerings, suppliers and frameworks
id.name: id

location_id.description: Pick list of applicable regions. There must be at least one, even if it is just 'UK'
location_id.name: location_id

sector_id.description:
Pick list of applicable sectors.
If set offering is only to be shown to users proven to belong to the sectors given
sector_id.name: sector_id

agreement_id.description: The agreement this interest relates to
agreement_id.name: agreement_id

party_id.description: The party this interest relates to
party_id.name: party_id

role.description: The role of the party in the involvment
role.name: role

id.description: a UUID for the person or contact point
id.name: id

party_id.description: contact is a link for this party
party_id.name: party_id

agreement_id.description: The agreement this offering relates to
agreement_id.name: agreement_id

id.description: unique id for the offering across all offerings, suppliers and frameworks
id.name: id

location_id.description: Pick list of applicable regions. There must be at least one, even if it is just 'UK'
location_id.name: location_id

sector_id.description:
Pick list of applicable sectors.
If set offering is only to be shown to users proven to belong to the sectors given
sector_id.name: sector_id

commission.description: The percentage the supplier charges for the item
commission.name: commission

branch_name.description: branch name from which the offer is supplied
branch_name.name: branch_name

branch_contact_id.description: links to contact at the address
branch_contact_id.name: branch_contact_id
